releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 标签末尾附有省略号 [自 1.8.5-dev1 起]
  2. 修复 创建播放列表时的的一些非预期行为 [自 1.8.5-dev2 起]
  3. 修复 设备重启后应用小部件中的图像不刷新
  4. 修复 退出多选时行为异常
  5. 修复 当邻近文件选项卡时无法正常退出应用程序
  6. 修复 更改后播放列表有时不会自动更新
  7. 修复 使用 SAF 删除播放列表时选择错误目录将会崩溃
  8. 改进 操作播放列表流程
  9. 改进 lrc歌词识别
  10. 开发 使用 SDK 35 编译
  11. 开发 升级 Gradle 至 8.10.2, 升级 AGP 至 8.7.1, 升级 kotlin 至 2.0.21
  12. 开发 升级 Jetpack Compose 至 1.7.4, 更新依赖
  13. 翻译 更新 西班牙语 (Dino RTX (rtxdino36))
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: tags always ending with ellipsis [since 1.8.5-dev1]
  2. Fix: some unexpected behaviours when creating playlists [since 1.8.5-dev2]
  3. Fix: Empty images in App Widgets after device rebooting
  4. Fix: unexpected behaviours when dismissing multi-selection action bar
  5. Fix: could not exit application properly when Files tab near by
  6. Fix: sometimes playlists would not be automatically updated after changing
  7. Fix: crash when deleting playlists using SAF but selecting wrong directory
  8. Improve: user experience on manipulating playlists
  9. Improve: lrc format lyric detection
  10. Development: compile with SDK 35
  11. Development: upgrade Gradle to 8.10.2, upgrade AGP to 8.7.1, upgrade kotlin to 2.0.21
  12. Development: upgrade Jetpack Compose to 1.7.4, update dependencies
  13. Translation: update Spanish (by Dino RTX (rtxdino36))
